page.title: 09Ecology Rat On Farm
page.content: When we went to the farm the farmer offered to show us his combine harvester. We all agreed and the farmer warned us that there might be a rat or a mouse that might run out from underneath the combine. He started it up and for quite a while nothing happened. Then just as the farmer was going to switch the combine off, out came a rat. Edward saw it first, "Look over there!" Edward shouted. The rat went straight past us and under a pile of bricks, sand and rubble. We thought it went behind another pile of sand but we could not find it. The farmer said we were very lucky to see it.
